committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development

official_title: A bill to improve the method of verifying the eligibility of individuals and families receiving assistance pursuant to the United States Housing Act of 1937.

summary.text: Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to: (1) permit the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to verify public housing eligibility data; (2) require an income review of each family applying for public housing assistance (currently a random sampling is verified); and (3) provide for reimbursement or program denial or termination for assistance application violations.

titles.title: A bill to improve the method of verifying the eligibility of individuals and families receiving assistance pursuant to the United States Housing Act of 1937.
